testcase.classname: Valid Email Address in Contact Details
testcase.name: Contact form accepts valid email address
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Flooid contact page.......................................passed When I enter a valid email address "user@example.com".......................passed Then I should not see an error message "Please enter a valid email address!".passed

testcase.classname: Validate Email Address in Contact Details
testcase.name: Contact form rejects invalid email addresses - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Flooid contact page.......................................passed When I enter an invalid email address "invalid-email".......................passed Then I should see an error message "Please enter a valid email address!"....passed

testcase.classname: Validate Email Address in Contact Details
testcase.name: Contact form rejects invalid email addresses - #1.2
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Flooid contact page.......................................passed When I enter an invalid email address "user@"...............................passed Then I should see an error message "Please enter a valid email address!"....passed

testcase.classname: Valid Email Address in Contact Details
testcase.name: Email address field is required
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Flooid contact page.......................................passed When I leave the email address field empty..................................passed Then I should see an error message "This is a required field."..............passed

testcase.classname: Validate Email Address in Contact Details
testcase.name: Contact form rejects invalid email addresses - #1.3
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Flooid contact page.......................................passed When I enter an invalid email address "@example.com"........................passed Then I should see an error message "Please enter a valid email address!"....passed
